label: 公方
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: An honorific title that originally referred to the emperor and his court. From the Kamakura period, it was used to refer to the shogun. During the Muromachi period, the term referred to the Ashikaga shoguns and their deputies in the Kantō region; see Kantō kubō.　[関東公方]
